sentences.english: Love is a great teacher, teach us to turn over a new leaf.
sentences.chinese: 愛是一位偉大的導師，教我們重新做人。

sentences.english: After released from prison, he was determined to turn over a new leaf.
sentences.chinese: 出獄後，他決心洗心革面，重新做人。

sentences.english: This is a new project to help ex-prisoners turn over a new leaf.
sentences.chinese: 這是一項皆在幫助出獄的犯人重新做人的新計劃。

sentences.english: The longer she wallows in feelings of guilt the harder it will be for her to make a fresh start.
sentences.chinese: 她越是長期不能擺脫有罪的感覺，就越難以重新做人。

sentences.english: The only chance they'll ever have is a halfway house, that'll help them get their feet under them again.
sentences.chinese: 過渡教習所幫助他們重新做人，這是他們唯一的機會。

sentences.english: He promised me that he would stand in front of me, a thorough new man.
sentences.chinese: 他向我保證他將洗心革面，重新做人。

sentences.english: He said he would one day get out of jail.
sentences.chinese: 信中說，總有一天他會走出監獄，重新做人。

sentences.english: The longer she wallows in feelings of guilt the harder it will be for her to .
sentences.chinese: 她越是長期不能擺脫有罪的感覺，就越難以重新做人。

sentences.english: Hence forth I will be a very different Toad.
sentences.chinese: 從今以後，我一定要重新做人。

sentences.english: I am turning over a new leaf.
Give me a chance to live again.
sentences.chinese: 給我一個重新做人的機會。

sentences.english: He is now perhaps sorry for what he has done, and anxious to re-establish a character.
sentences.chinese: 也許他現在已經後悔，痛下決心，重新做人。
